items.name: Width
lines: contains the width of the device in pixels.

items.name: Height
lines: contains the height of the device in pixels.

items.name: LeftInset
lines: contains the inset from the left.

items.name: TopInset
lines: contains the inset from the top.

items.name: RightInset
lines: contains the inset from the right.

items.name: BottomInset
lines: contains the inset from the bottom.

items.name: PixelPerMeterX
lines: contains the X-axis resolution of the device in pixel/meter.

items.name: PixelPerMeterY
lines: contains the Y-axis resolution of the device in pixel/meter.

items.name: BitsPerPixel
lines: contains the color-depth of the device.

items.name: Capabilities
lines: specifies special operations which are possible on the device.
